titleStmt.title: The case of the Jews is altered, and their synagogue shut to all evil-walkers, or, A vindication of the Jewes from the false imputations laid upon them in a scurrilous pamphlet intituled, The case of the Jews stated, or, The Jews synagogue opened. / by Joseph Copley ...
titleStmt.author: Copley, Joseph.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: Stained and slightly faded, with print show-through.
Reproduction of original in the Guildhall, London.
